title: Bowl Depicting a Falconer and Four Pairs of Seated Figures
medium: Ceramic, Fritware, covered with a turquoise glaze with in-glaze and overglaze painting in red, green, blue, yellow, black, and gold
inscribed:
... مرا مهر توام ... لی نیست / جانـ... لی نیست / گر در ظلمه؟ همی رود بقصری؟ / یک لحظه ز خدمت تو دل خالی نیست /

Read and transcribed by Dr. Abdullah Ghouchani, Winter 2014.
credit_line: Gift of the Ernest Erickson Foundation, Inc.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
